attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe (as does my pocket) that the Government is taxing middle britain too much.

We demand the Government slim itself down, in order to fund a whole measure of tax breaks.

The UK has the highest Tax burden in Europe and it makes sense to ease the burden to encourage more inward investment, which will bring more jobs and eventually more tax payers.

Reduce the tax burden Mr PM.
